title: Hey Lin ... Where are the kids?
review: Our kids go here all the time. They solved a murder mystery there once.

title: I can see you JIMMY
review: Yeah sure, the pizza's FINE if you don't want an original daily recipe that incorporates clever wordplay.

title: The owner was at the capitol on Jan 6
review: I mean, the mozarella sticks are great, but ... yeesh.

title: Love the server
review: Yeah the burgers are great! And I love the server, so talented.

title: Strong Margaritas
review: Aren't margaritas a mexican restaurant thing? Eh, better have another to make sure.

title: Wanda Warf Warf of Wanda
review: Love the chilli cheese fries. Mm, so good.

title: Pecking Order
review: So that Turkey Trot they had on Thanksgiving was something huh? Hahaha ha ...yeugh.

title: The ears add six inches
review: No body even cares if you wear your hat when you go up to the height measure. This place is GREAT.
